mapper.sql:
WHERE 1 = 1
AND (P.PJ_TTL LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%' OR P.PJ_DESC LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%' )
AND P.PJ_TTL LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND P.PJ_DESC LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM PJ_INFO P INNER JOIN MBR_INFO M ON P.ORDR_ID = M.EMIL_ADDR
mapper.insert:
SELECT 'PJ-' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '-' || LPAD(PJ_INFO_PK_SEQ.NEXTVAL, 6, '0') FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO PJ_INFO (PJ_ID, ORDR_ID, PJ_TTL, RGSTR_DT, STRT_DT, END_DT, CNTRCT_ACCNT, PJ_DESC, PJ_RCRUT_CNT, PJ_RCRUT_STRT_DT, PJ_RCRUT_END_DT) VALUES (#{pjId}, #{ordrId}, #{pjTtl}, SYSDATE, TO_DATE(#{strtDt}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), TO_DATE(#{endDt}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{cntrctAccnt}, #{pjDesc}, #{pjRcrutCnt}, TO_DATE(#{pjRcrutStrtDt}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), TO_DATE(#{pjRcrutEndDt}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'))

SELECT 'PJ-APPLY' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '-' || LPAD(PJ_APPLY_PK_SEQ.NEXTVAL, 6, '0') FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO PJ_APPLY (PJ_APPLY_ID, EMIL_ADDR, PJ_ID, PJ_APPLY_RGSTR_DT, PJ_APPLY_TTL, PJ_APPLY_DESC) VALUES (#{pjApplyId}, #{emilAddr}, #{pjId}, SYSDATE, #{pjApplyTtl}, #{pjApplyDesc})
mapper.select: SELECT PJ_ID ,ORDR_ID ,OBTN_ID ,PJ_TTL ,RGSTR_DT ,STRT_DT ,END_DT ,CNTRCT_ACCNT ,PJ_DESC ,IS_DLT ,DLT_DT ,LST_MOD_DT ,IS_RCRUT_ADD ,PJ_STT ,VIEW_CNT ,PJ_RCRUT_CNT ,PJ_RCRUT_STRT_DT ,PJ_RCRUT_END_DT FROM PJ_INFO WHERE ORDR_ID = #{_parameter} AND PJ_STT NOT IN 4

SELECT P.PJ_ID , P.ORDR_ID , P.OBTN_ID , P.PJ_TTL , TO_CHAR(P.RGSTR_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') RGSTR_DT , TO_CHAR(P.STRT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') STRT_DT , TO_CHAR(P.END_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') END_DT , P.CNTRCT_ACCNT , P.PJ_DESC , P.IS_DLT , TO_CHAR(P.DLT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') DLT_DT , TO_CHAR(P.LST_MOD_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') LST_MOD_DT , P.IS_RCRUT_ADD , P.PJ_STT , P.VIEW_CNT , P.PJ_RCRUT_CNT , TO_CHAR(P.PJ_RCRUT_STRT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') PJ_RCRUT_STRT_DT , TO_CHAR(P.PJ_RCRUT_END_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') PJ_RCRUT_END_DT , PY.PYMNT_ID , PY.PJ_ID , PY.GRNT_AMT , PY.CNTRCT_AMT , TO_CHAR(PY.GRNT_PD_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') GRNT_PD_DT , TO_CHAR(PY.CNTRCT_PD_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') CNTRCT_PD_DT , PY.ACCNT_NM , PY.PYMNT_TYP , PY.IMP_UID , PY.DPST_RFND_AMNT , TO_CHAR(PY.DPST_RFND_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') DPST_RFND_DT FROM PJ_INFO P LEFT JOIN PYMNT_INFO PY ON P.PJ_ID = PY.PJ_ID WHERE P.PJ_ID = #{_parameter}

SELECT P.PJ_ID , P.ORDR_ID , P.OBTN_ID , P.PJ_TTL , TO_CHAR(P.RGSTR_DT,'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일"') RGSTR_DT , TO_CHAR(P.STRT_DT,'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일"') STRT_DT , TO_CHAR(P.END_DT,'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일"') END_DT , P.CNTRCT_ACCNT , P.PJ_DESC , P.IS_RCRUT_ADD , P.PJ_STT , P.VIEW_CNT , P.PJ_RCRUT_CNT , TO_CHAR(P.PJ_RCRUT_STRT_DT , 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일"') RCRUT_STRT_DT , TO_CHAR(P.PJ_RCRUT_END_DT , 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일"') PJ_RCRUT_END_DT FROM PJ_INFO P INNER JOIN MBR_INFO M ON P.ORDR_ID = M.EMIL_ADDR
ORDER BY
P.RGSTR_DT DESC P.PJ_RCRUT_END_DT ASC P.CNTRCT_ACCNT DESC P.RGSTR_DT DESC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM as RNUM , S.* FROM ( SELECT P.PJ_ID , P.ORDR_ID , P.OBTN_ID , P.PJ_TTL , TO_CHAR(P.RGSTR_DT,'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일"') RGSTR_DT , TO_CHAR(P.STRT_DT,'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일"') STRT_DT , TO_CHAR(P.END_DT,'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일"') END_DT , P.CNTRCT_ACCNT , P.PJ_DESC , P.IS_RCRUT_ADD , P.PJ_STT , P.VIEW_CNT , P.PJ_RCRUT_CNT , TO_CHAR(P.PJ_RCRUT_STRT_DT , 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일"') RCRUT_STRT_DT , TO_CHAR(P.PJ_RCRUT_END_DT , 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일"') PJ_RCRUT_END_DT FROM PJ_INFO P INNER JOIN MBR_INFO M ON P.ORDR_ID = M.EMIL_ADDR
WHERE 1 = 1
AND (P.PJ_TTL LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%' OR P.PJ_DESC LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%' )
AND P.PJ_TTL LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND P.PJ_DESC LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
ORDER BY
P.RGSTR_DT DESC P.PJ_RCRUT_END_DT ASC P.CNTRCT_ACCNT DESC
P.RGSTR_DT DESC
) S WHERE ROWNUM <= (#{currPageNo} + 1)*#{exposureListSize} ) WHERE RNUM >= #{currPageNo} * #{exposureListSize} + 1
mapper.update: UPDATE PJ_INFO SET PJ_TTL=#{pjTtl}, CNTRCT_ACCNT=#{cntrctAccnt}, PJ_DESC=#{pjDesc}, LST_MOD_DT=SYSDATE, PJ_RCRUT_CNT=#{pjRcrutCnt}, WHERE PJ_ID=#{pjId}

UPDATE PJ_INFO SET PJ_TTL = #{pjTtl}, STRT_DT = #{strtDt}, END_DT = #{endDt}, CNTRCT_ACCNT = #{cntrctAccnt}, PJ_DESC = #{pjDesc}, IS_RCRUT_ADD = 1, PJ_RCRUT_CNT = #{pjRcrutCnt}, PJ_RCRUT_STRT_DT = #{pjRcrutStrtDt}, PJ_RCRUT_END_DT = #{pjRcrutEndDt}, LST_MOD_DT = SYSDATE WHERE PJ_ID = #{pjId}
UPDATE PJ_INFO SET IS_DLT = 1, DLT_DT = SYSDATE WHERE PJ_ID = #{_parameter}
UPDATE PJ_APPLY SET PJ_APPLY_TTL = #{pjApplyTtl}, PJ_APPLY_DESC = #{pjApplyDesc}, PJ_APPLY_MDFY_DT = SYSDATE WHERE PJ_APPLY_ID = #{pjApplyId} AND EMIL_ADDR = #{emilAddr}
mapper.select: SELECT P.PJ_APPLY_ID , M.EMIL_ADDR , P.PJ_ID , P.PJ_APPLY_RGSTR_DT , P.PJ_APPLY_TTL , P.PJ_APPLY_DESC , P.PJ_APPLY_MDFY_DT , PA.PJ_APPLY_ATT_ID , PA.PJ_APPLY_ATT_URL FROM PJ_APPLY P JOIN MBR_INFO M ON M.EMIL_ADDR = P.EMIL_ADDR JOIN PJ_APPLY_ATT PA ON PA.PJ_APPLY_ID = P.PJ_APPLY_ID WHERE p.PJ_ID = #{_parameter}

SELECT PJ_ID , ORDR_ID , OBTN_ID , PJ_TTL , RGSTR_DT , STRT_DT , END_DT , CNTRCT_ACCNT , PJ_DESC , IS_DLT , DLT_DT , LST_MOD_DT , IS_RCRUT_ADD , PJ_STT , VIEW_CNT , PJ_RCRUT_CNT , PJ_RCRUT_STRT_DT , PJ_RCRUT_END_DT FROM PJ_INFO WHERE ORDR_ID IN ( SELECT EMIL_ADDR FROM MBR_INFO WHERE CMP_ID =( SELECT CMP_ID FROM MBR_INFO WHERE EMIL_ADDR =#{emilAddr}))
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PJ_SCRP (PJ_SCRP_ID ,EMIL_ADDR ,PJ_ID) VALUES ('AL-' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')|| '-' || LPAD(PJ_SCRP_PK_SEQ.NEXTVAL, 6, '0') , #{emilAddr} , #{pjId})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM PJ_INFO PI INNER JOIN PJ_PRM_STK PPS ON PI.PJ_ID = PPS.PJ_ID
SELECT * FROM PJ_INDSTR PI LEFT JOIN INDSTR_INFO II ON PI.INDSTR_ID = II.INDSTR_ID WHERE PI.PJ_ID = #{_parameter}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PJ_PRM_STK (PJ_PRM_STK_ID , PJ_ID , PRM_STK_ID) VALUES ('PJ-PRM-STK' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '-' || LPAD(PJ_PRM_STK_PK_SEQ.NEXTVAL, 6, '0') , #{pjId} , #{prmStkId})
mapper.select: SELECT PJ_APPLY_ID, EMIL_ADDR, PJ_ID, PJ_APPLY_RGSTR_DT, PJ_APPLY_TTL, PJ_APPLY_DESC, PJ_APPLY_MDFY_DT FROM PJ_APPLY PA WHERE PJ_APPLY_ID = #{pjApplyId} AND EMIL_ADDR = #{emilAddr} AND PJ_ID = #{pjId}
